Some events follow ISO 20121 standard fo: What is ISO 20121 standard? Events following ISO 20121 standard

ISO 20121 is a beacon for sustainable event management, guiding organizations to seamlessly integrate sustainability into every facet of their event planning and execution. With a keen eye on social, economic, and environmental impacts, this standard is pivotal for events that aspire to leave a lasting positive legacy.

ISO 20121 is a beacon for sustainable event management, guiding organizations to seamlessly integrate sustainability into every facet of their event planning ...
What is ISO 20121 standard? Events following ISO 20121 standard
ISO 20121 equips you to optimize your resources, reduce costs and mitigate risks to the environment and local community.
What is ISO 20121 standard? Events following ISO 20121 standard
From small gatherings to stadium-filling sporting events or concerts, ISO 20121:2024 is the leading sustainable event management standard.
What is ISO 20121 standard? Events following ISO 20121 standard
The IMF has achieved the ISO 20121 certificate for sustainable events for the Spring and Annual Meetings held in Washington DC.
What is ISO 20121 standard? Events following ISO 20121 standard
ISO 20121 is the international standard for sustainable event management, guiding us on how to integrate social, economic and environmental sustainability.
